name: Hakoniwa Explorer Plus
description: Get ready for a voxel art action game featuring an unprecedented level of freedom! A whole range of cute girl monsters are waiting to punch, kick, wrap you up, suck your blood, and eat you right up.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Family DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
